title: Alex Sobel – 2020 Comments on Heritage Sites at Risk
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Alex Sobel, the Shadow Minister for Tourism and Heritage, on 15 October 2020. He was making reference to an announcement that more heritage sites are at risk than have been saved.
content:
This is incredibly sad news.
